text: The 2017–18 División de Honor de Hockey Hierba was the 52nd season of the División de Honor de Hockey Hierba, the highest field hockey league in Spain. The season began on 23 September 2017 and concluded on 3 June 2018. Atlètic Terrassa were the defending champions. Real Club de Polo won the regular season and their fifteenth national title by defeating Junior 3–1 after shootouts in the final. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team !! Location !!
